price: A dat će vam i drugu blagodat koju volite: Allahovu pomoć i skoru pobjedu! Zato obraduj vjernike!
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَاۖ نَصۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَتۡحٞ قَرِيبٞۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā tuḥibbūnahā naṣrun mina al-lahi wafatḥun qarībun wabashiri al-mu'minīna
